title: Beautiful townhouse close to Hayward BART and Cal State East Bay 6
posting_body: ['FEATURES', '• 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms', '• Part of a 3-unit building', '• Well-maintained and clean', '• Hardwood and tile flooring throughout.', 'Low maintenance.', 'Easy to clean.', 'Carpet-free.', '• Large living room', '• Open kitchen and dining area', '• Large and private backyard.', 'Not shared with any other unit.', '• Dedicated assigned parking for 2 cars — 1 carport (covered) parking space, 1 driveway parking space', '• Convenient coin-operated washer and dryer in the building (30 feet away).', 'No in-unit laundry hookups.', 'ROOM DIMENSIONS', '• Bedroom #1 — 9 ft 8 in × 11 ft 4 in (116 × 136 in)', '• Bedroom #2 — 10 ft 7 in × 11 ft 8 in (127 × 140 in)', '• Living room — 11 ft 10 in × 14 ft 4 in (142 × 172 in)', 'TAKE A VIDEO TOUR', '• <URL>', 'CONVENIENTLY LOCATED', '• ½ mile from Downtown Hayward (restaurants, groceries, shopping)', '• 1 mile from Hayward BART Station', '• 2 miles from freeways 580, 880, 238, and 92', '• 2 miles from Cal State East Bay (CSU)', 'ADDITIONAL INFORMATION', '• Deposit: $2,570 (subject to applicant qualifications and OAC)', '• Available: Now', '• Application screening fee: $20 per adult', '• Utilities: Resident responsible for all utilities', '• Renters insurance: Required (your auto insurance agent can help you get one)', 'WHEN REPLYING TO THIS AD, PLEASE INCLUDE', 'For your household:', '1.', 'Total # of people who will be living in the home:', '2.', 'How many of them (including yourself) smoke (any substance, including electronic cigarettes, vapes, marijuana, etc.)?', '3. List all pets and animals:', '4.', 'When you intend to sign a new lease and start paying rent to your new place:', '5.', 'Do your bank statements show a total combined household balance of at least 3 times the monthly rent?', '6.', 'Did you take the video tour?', 'For each adult in your household:', '1.', 'Name, phone, and email:', '2.', 'Credit score (free at Credit Karma):', '3.', 'Current occupation:', '4.', 'Monthly verifiable gross (before-tax) income:']
